programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Lester Holt spends two nights locked up and embedded inside the largest maximum security prison in America, the notorious Louisiana State Penitentiary, also known as Angola.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Keith Morrison reports on a dramatic undercover operation in Palm Beach, Florida to save a wife and mother who had no idea she was in danger.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.sub-title: The Beauty and the Beast Mystery
programme.desc: An Indiana mother is found asphyxiated in her basement gym.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Police link a filmmaker who is obsessed with the show "Dexter" with a man's disappearance.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The mystery of a successful real estate entrepreneur killed by a car bomb spans nearly two decades.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Brittany Stork's decades-long quest to find out more about her mother's mysterious death leads to a dramatic courtroom decision; the man at the center of the case tells his side of the story.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.sub-title: The Rise and Fall of Oscar Pistorius
programme.desc: Oscar Pistorius shoots and kills his girlfriend just eight months after competing in the London Olympics, telling police that he believed she was an intruder and he was acting in self-defense.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A risky undercover operation in a rough prison could expose a suspected serial killer's secrets.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a man claims to have found his wife dead in the bathtub, the woman's daughters suspect there may be more to the story.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: As Hurricane Charley ravages a small town in Florida, a man trying to avoid his past hides out in a hotel room.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When Tina Sandoval disappears, her parents and loved ones spend years searching for her; a secret she was keeping may lead to clues about what happened to her.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A 40-year-old Minnesota woman is shot to death in her bed while her husband and teenage daughter are home, leaving investigators to wonder who would want her dead.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a woman's remains are found miles from her home, investigators start digging into her past.

programme.desc: A man's children stand by him as he deals with courts in upstate New York.
